title: SkipNextOutputUpdate (Method)
text:
METHOD PUBLIC SkipNextOutputUpdate
Sets a flag to skip the next call to
BeforeWriteOutputs
.
This can be used in a scenario where
BeforeWriteOutputs
gets called from within the application, instead of from implicit
code, e.g. in order to fake I/O values for debug or test purposes.
Note
BeforeWriteOutputs
should not be called more than
once per cycle.
